com.massivecraft.factions.util.Particles

Class ParticleEffect.OrdinaryColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.massivecraft.factions.util.Particles.ParticleEffect.ParticleColor
      • com.massivecraft.factions.util.Particles.ParticleEffect.OrdinaryColor
  • Enclosing class:
    ParticleEffect

    public static final class ParticleEffect.OrdinaryColor
extends ParticleEffect.ParticleColor
    Represents the color for effects like ParticleEffect.SPELL_MOB, ParticleEffect.SPELL_MOB_AMBIENT and ParticleEffect.NOTE This class is part of the ParticleEffect Library and follows the same usage conditions
    Since:
    1.7
